page.title: 06WIVELISCOMBE SCHOOL NOW
page.content:
. In our school, Wiveliscombe Primary School,we have 200 children aged from four to eleven. There are 7 classes and 7 teachers, plus a headmaster. Our school is over a hundred years old. We have our television room in the old headmaster's house, and the staff room is in there as well .
We have clubs at dinner times, and we have clubs for all the classes on a Friday afternoon, with parents helping. We have a school radio station called "Radio Wivey" which broadcasts stories, news, competitions, etc. on Friday mornings.
This year we built a pond and a conservation area. It already has many plants and animals in there.
